General.Name: Fredonia Mining Inc
General.Description: Fredonia Mining Inc. engages in the exploration of gold and silver resources. Its flagship project is the El Dorado Monserrat project that comprises various license blocks covering approximately 6,000 ha. Fredonia Mining Inc. was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 350 Bay Street # 700, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 2S6

4.Name: Mr. Omar  Salas CPA, CMA, M.B.A.
